column1: Alto Lucero (formally: Alto Lucero de Gutiérrez Barrios) is a city in the Mexican state of Veracruz. It is located at 19°37′N 96°44′W
column2: some 35 km from state capital Xalapa. It serves as the administrative centre for the surrounding municipality of the same name.

column1: The Laguna Verde nuclear power plant
was built near the town of Punta Limón in Alto Lucero municipality during the 1970s.
